update.description:
New testing job to test nvidia-docker2 in nvidia-docker2. Used for running the dockerhub subt image: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-install-dockerhub-bionic-amd64](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-install-dockerhub-bionic-amd64)

Some changes:

* Refactor nvidia-docker installations into its own file
* Change all subt testing runs to `tunnel_circuit_practice.ign`
* Implement the option to skip the squid proxy

**Tested:**

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=subt-install-dockerhub-bionic-amd64&build=43)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-install-dockerhub-bionic-amd64/43/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-install-dockerhub-bionic-amd64/43/))

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=subt-ci-pr_any-bionic-amd64&build=515)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-ci-pr\_any-bionic-amd64/515/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-ci-pr_any-bionic-amd64/515/))

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=subt-ci_long-default-bionic-amd64&build=22)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-ci\_long-default-bionic-amd64/22/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-ci_long-default-bionic-amd64/22/))
update.title: CI support for dockerhub runs in subt
